transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir main Rukhsaar baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Haan sir wo actually main aapko call kar rahi thi ki aapka hamare paas ek feedback aaya hai. Manish ke ye primary number pe aapke father hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan unse baat hui hogi. To ek feedback gaya tha Manish ke ka service ka ki Manish ke sath aapka coordination kaisa hai?
Customer: Haan haan ji.
Executive: To haan to usme na aapka feedback hamare paas not satisfied aaya tha. To mujhe usse related aapse baat karni thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm bataiye.
Executive: Bataiye sir aap kaise service chal rahi hai aapke IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Hmm service nahi chal rahi.
Executive: Service nahi chal rahi hai matlab?
Customer: Lead aagri lead sahi nahi aa raha hai lead. Ye mandiro ki to lead temple ki lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Abhi current mein aapko inki leads nahi aa rahi hai stone ki?
Customer: Haan current mein kam se kam teen month ho gaye hain. Aaye hue.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi jaise main check kar rahi hun yahan par to jo abhi sabse jyada jo aapko leads aa rahi hai aur buyleads consume kar rahe hain wo hai stone pillars. Fir hai stone temples. Fir hai sand stone jaali, stone grills, stone carvings and stone uh uh polish plus aur railing glass. To ye abhi inme currently deal nahi kar rahe hain aap in saare categories mein?
Customer: Aa hi nahi rahi aisi koi lead.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yahan pe aapke father ke sath discussion hua hai to unhone update kiya hai service renewal se related kyunki aapka renewal bhi hamare paas mein generated hai. To usse related yahan pe update hai last time jo Manish sir ki baat hui hai. Services vagerah services ko leke discussion hua hai is bare mein.
Customer: To mam maine Manish ji ko bhi ek cheez batai thi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Wo Surat ki ek party thi hamari. Wo usne bill ke payment nahi kiye abhi. Char month ho chuke hain.
Executive: Haan is bare mein meri shayad aapse is bare mein baat hui hai. Total jo deal value thi wo ₹5 lakh thi. ₹5 lakh plus amount kuch tha. Jisme se client ne aapko ₹4 lakh complete pay kar diya hai. Remaining aapka ₹1 lakh I think pending hai abhi.
Customer: Haan haan. Lekin wo buyer ne to aapse kaha hai na ki wo aapse agle 15 din baad connect kare last time jab aapka discussion hua tha mera.
Executive: Wo phone bhi nahi attend karta.
Customer: Last time meri baat jinse hui thi ye 19th November ko hi hui thi to unhone kaha tha ki customer ne kaha hai ki 15 days baad connect kariyega mujhe abhi unko thoda fund ka issue hai.
Customer: Mam itna bhi fund ka issue thodi hota hai. Haan char month se paisa hi nahi aa rahe uske paas.
Executive: Achha aapki baat hoti hai buyer phone uthate hain jaise aap unhe phone karte hain to phone aapka attend karte hain wo?
Customer: Mera nahi karte wo message ka bhi koi reply nahi dete.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Last time meri baat hui thi. Ye aapke father se baat hui thi I think is bare mein to unhone kaha tha ki humne 15 days bola hai unhone ki hum 15 din baad aap mujhe contact kariyega 15 days baad hum isko final kar dunga aapka remaining amount main aapko pay kar dunga.
Customer: To mam wo kyun gumrah karta hai fir ki mera ye sahi nahi hua mera pani aata hai. Wo gumrah kyun karta hai?
Customer: Mera bhi sheesha fitting nahi hua aaj.
Customer: Aur?
Customer: Chalu kar.
Customer: Ye bolta hai ye bolta hai fir ab phone nahi uthata kabhi bol raha hai ki scanner dal do payment dal raha hun subah karwa dunga morning mein karwa dunga. Monday ko karwa dunga aise bolta hai.
Executive: Dekhiye meri 19th ko aapse baat hui thi to 19 tarikh ko unhone shayad aapko call pe ya message pe jaise bhi kaha ki hum main 15 15 din baad isko final kar dunga. To 15 din ka aapko aur wait kar lena chahiye agar aapke sath buyer coordinate kar rahe hain to aap thoda sa coordinate karke unse apna amount jo hai wo collect kar sakte hain.
Customer: To mam kitne din coordinate kare hum?
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar aap pehle jab aapse unki deal ho rahi thi agar unhone ₹4 lakh wala amount aapko pay kar diya to of course bahut seedhi si baat hai ki wo aapko remaining bhi pay karenge.
Customer: Nahi karega wo ek bhi ek bhi rupay pay nahi karega wo usko main jaanta hun.
Customer: Aapke janne wale the?
Customer: Janne wale nahi to main uski baton se pehchan leta hun ki kaun insan payment karne wala hai kaun nahi karne wala hai. Barobar phone uthaye na to tab pata chalta hai ki samne wala payment karega ya nahi karega. Wo mahine mein do bar to call uthata 30 bar to call nahi uthata.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To kya ummid rakhoge unse?
Customer: Aapse aapki call se aapka call jata hai wahan se wahan pe to wo wo wahan pe hum call karte hain tab uthata hai. Kewal ek din ya do din call uthayega uske baad mein fir wo warna call mein uthana hi band kar dega.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aise karo tum usne 15 din ki bol raha hai 15 din mein main 19 tarikh ko bola hai na apna panch ko panch ko 15 ho jayega uska.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Panch ko main call nahi karunga aap call karke aap pooch lena.
Executive: Thik hai sir ek baar ye bhi karke dekh leti hun main ek baar.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Conference pe connect karke ek baar buyer se baat karne mein koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai iske alava sir aur bataiye koi aur problem?
Customer: Aur to koi problem nahi hai mam aur ye lead ka thodi dikkat aa rahi hai. Isko thoda solution kijiye mera kya hai ki bada bada plan lene ka man hai magar abhi thoda soch rahe hain ki iska issue hone pe ki thoda lead bhi nahi aa rahe hain to thoda vishwas uthta hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapko hamare paas se deal mili hai agar kabhi dekhiye business mein thoda upar niche to hota hai kisi mahine aapko bahut achcha jayega ye offline ho ya online ho kisi mahine aapka bahut achcha jayega kisi mahine thoda sa kharab. Nahi wo wo wo wo cheez chalti hai magar teen mahine ye ek do mahine se to bilkul hi mandiro ki to lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye jo hamare paas jo dikh raha hai na jo aap leads vagerah consume kar rahe hain maine jo aapko batayi thi wahi wali categories hai. Agar aap mandir wali search karke karenge ya aapki screen pe agar koi dikh rahi hai lead aur aap consume kar lete hain to aane wale time mein aur dikhegi aapko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan. Main jaise check kar rahi hun abhi leads yahan par to stone cement trading pillars mandir temple.
Executive: Aap bataiye main search karke batau aapko leads hamare paas hai ya mandir wali ya nahi?
Customer: Nahi main kar lunga wo chalo unka bhi koi issue nahi hai magar main issue to iska hai na ki jo payment safe nahi hai. Jo bill ka payment nahi hai.
Executive: Jab 15 days honge complete to main ek baar baat kar lungi aap keh rahe hain conference pe baat kar lenge hum log ek baar buyer se thik hai. Understand karne ke liye ki wo karna chahte hain payment aapko ya nahi karna chahte hain thik hai. Iske sath jo feedback hamare paas aaya tha sir ye jo Manish ko aap aapke yahan se diya gaya tha not satisfied main usko close kar du sir?
Customer: Close kar do.
Executive: Okay thank you koi aapko help ki zarurat lage to aap mujhe call kar lijiyega same number pe. Thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay. Okay thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads for temple-related products.

- Buyer from Surat has not paid bill.

- Feels payment is not safe.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect on conference call.

- Executive will follow up after 15 days.

- Agreed to close the 'not satisfied' feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call buyer after 15 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, payment, follow up, conference call
